# [Interview #571: TOM Signing Report - Zaela Sedai, Entry #11](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=571#11)

#### Brandon Sanderson

Brandon would not confirm that we’ve seen the 13/13 turning to the Dark One’s side.
